Class GameController

java.lang.Object
org.mio.progettoingsoft.network.server.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
The GameController is responsible for coordinating the game logic, processing events, updating the game model (FlyBoard), and communicating state changes and events back to the connected clients. It acts as the central hub for game flow and interactions.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      public GameController(GameServer game, BlockingQueue<Event> eventsQueue)
      Constructs a new GameController in normal operating mode. Starts a daemon thread responsible for sending messages to clients from the event queue.
      Parameters:
      game - The GameServer instance that this controller manages.
      eventsQueue - The BlockingQueue of Event objects to process and send.

    • GameController

      public GameController(GameServer game, BlockingQueue<Event> eventsQueue, boolean testing)
      Constructs a new GameController with an option for testing mode.
      Parameters:
      game - The GameServer instance that this controller manages.
      eventsQueue - The BlockingQueue of Event objects to process.
      testing - A boolean indicating if the controller is in testing mode.

  • Method Details

    • registerListener

      public void registerListener()
      Registers a PropertyChangeListener with the game's FlyBoard. This listener captures events fired by the FlyBoard (e.g., player movement, battery removal, credit changes, good removal, player leaving) and converts them into generic Event objects to be added to the eventsQueue.

    • finishHourglass

      public void finishHourglass(int activation)
      Handles the completion of an hourglass turn. It sends a FINISH_HOURGLASS or FINISH_LAST_HOURGLASS state update to all clients, depending on the activation parameter (e.g., 3 for the last hourglass). If an error occurs during communication, it delegates to ServerController.handleGameCrash(java.lang.Exception, java.lang.String, int).
      Parameters:
      activation - An integer indicating the activation count of hourglasses, used to determine if it's the last one.

    • update

      public void update(SldAdvCard card)
      Updates client states based on the current state of a played SldAdvCard. This method is a central dispatcher for guiding clients through the card effects. It sends specific SetCardStateEvent or SetStateEvent to relevant players.
      Parameters:
      card - The SldAdvCard whose state has changed.
